title: Mine Loop
description: Mine Loop is an idle game that challenges you to dig deep and explore the earth with your train to unearth valuable ores. Transform into the premier Mine Company by collecting ores, earning money, and upgrading your operations. Expand your rail system with new carts, merge for increased capacity, and elevate ore market prices. Relax as the looping train effortlessly gathers your riches, but don't forget to tap for a speed boost. Delve deeper for rare ores as your gold collection grows!
